snippet: The United Nations said that a peacekeeper was killed Thursday in the Central African Republic.
abstract: United Nations says peacekeeper is killed in the Central African Republic, first death on force since UN took over responsibility for halting violence between Christians and Muslims.
lead_paragraph: The United Nations said that a peacekeeper was killed Thursday in the Central African Republic.

headline.main: Central African Republic: U.N. Peacekeeper Killed
headline.print_headline: Central African Republic: U.N. Peacekeeper Killed
